roleset.name: give to, donate (again)
roleset.note: REALLOCATE-V NOTES: Based on transformation of allocate. No actual sentences examined. Vncls future_having-13.3. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from reallocate.01-v)

example.name: passivized
example.text: [About $490 million of that]-1 would be reallocated *trace*-1 to the buy-back, leaving about $130 million, he said.

example.name: with source
example.text: To accommodate the additional cash assistance, [the House Appropriations Committee]-1 last week was required *trace*-1 to reallocate an estimated $140 million from the Pentagon.
